handleResetBtn() - Method in class controller.MainController
handleResetBtn public void handleResetBtn() Resets the board, and sets all element in the array to dead, and the dead cells have the same color as the background color.
handleStartBtn() - Method in class controller.MainController
handleStartBtn public void handleStartBtn() Starts and pauses the animation of the cells on the board.

hasNextRulesCollection() - Method in class model.GameRules
hasNextRulesCollection public boolean hasNextRulesCollection() Checks if the next rules exists or not, returns false if there is no next rule, and it returns true if a next rule exists.

hasPosition public abstract boolean hasPosition(int x, int y); Checks if the coordinates given is accepted by the board.
